title: Shiny Apps as Package Demos
text: latest version ShinyDemo package can installed using devtools package. package developers, simply include Shiny apps inst/shiny directory within R package. ShinyDemo::shiny_demo() function automatically find apps.
code: devtools::install_github('jbryer/ShinyDemo') library('ShinyDemo') shiny_demo() shiny_demo('df_viewer',            mtcars = mtcars,            faithful = faithful)
